encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change:
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Metada: Remove volume number and Side (v) from biblio 11073. Add image link: http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH0155/dbc7e045.dir/POxy.v0053.n3702.a.01.hires.jpg Columns: 1 --> 2. General Notes: --> TM 111187 = P.Oxy. 53 3702r descr. (account). Add Pleiades georefs: https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736982 (for Oxyrhynchites) and https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983 (for Oxyrhynchus)
Text: Encode middots throughout as *middot*. Col. 1, ln 3: Πολύξεινος --> Πολύξενος. L. 5-6: Enclose entire name in reg tag. L. 8: dot final nu in Ἀθηνῶ]ν. L. 10-11: enclose entire name in reg tag. L. 13: no reg tag needed; print (Φερῶ(ν)). L. 14: give reading of papyrus, ἀριστε, and record the editors †Ἀριστε† in the app. with an ed tag? L. 21: the ed. pr. doesn't not underdot any letter iin Σχεδί̣ο̣ς in the normalized text. L. 22: ed pr. has Εἰφίτ]ου not Ἰφίτ]ου. L. 25: no reg tag; instead print (Θηβῶ(ν)). Col. 2, the page number 122 (ρκβ) should occupy its own line, embedded in a num tag (but how?--as upper margin?). L. 27: record trema marks in Ιαλ̣μ̣ L. 28: give reading of papyrus, Μινύρου, and record the editors †Μινύρου† in the app. with an ed tag? Add paragraphos beetween lines 29 and 30. Ln. 31: record trema mark in Εἰκ̣αρ̣ι̣ο̣υ and capitalize the word to right of reg. Add num tag in this line and in 33 (bis) and 34. L. 32: --> <:ἐκ|reg|ἐγ:>. L. 33: κ̣̅[δ̅·] is not what is printed in the ed. pr. L. 34 has not been entered correctly. L. 41: record apostrophe between πρὸς and γάμον; register deletion 〚Αι〛. L. 42: <:Δ̣α̣ναί̈δας|reg|δαναί̈δες:> does not reflect what is in the ed. pr. (corr tag needed instead); trema marks wrongly encoded. L. 46: --> βρα̣χ̣ὺ̣[ν] [.?] In lines 50 and 51 add ] [.?] at line end. 53: record trema marks correctly; --> Θράκης. L. 55: ed. pr. spells Ἐργεῖνος. L. 59: reg is incorrectly recorded. L. 60: --> Πεί

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Metada: Remove volume number and Side (v) from biblio 11073. Add image link: http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH0155/dbc7e045.dir/POxy.v0053.n3702.a.01.hires.jpg Columns: 1 --> 2. General Notes: --> TM 111187 = P.Oxy. 53 3702r descr. (account). Add Pleiades georefs: https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736982 (for Oxyrhynchites) and https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983 (for Oxyrhynchus)
Text: Encode middots throughout as *middot*. Col. 1, ln 3: Πολύξεινος --> Πολύξενος. L. 5-6: Enclose entire name in reg tag. L. 8: dot final nu in Ἀθηνῶ]ν. L. 10-11: enclose entire name in reg tag. L. 13: no reg tag needed; print (Φερῶ(ν)). L. 14: give reading of papyrus, ἀριστε, and record the editors †Ἀριστε† in the app. with an ed tag? L. 21: the ed. pr. doesn't not underdot any letter iin Σχεδί̣ο̣ς in the normalized text. L. 22: ed pr. has Εἰφίτ]ου not Ἰφίτ]ου. L. 25: no reg tag; instead print (Θηβῶ(ν)). Col. 2, the page number 122 (ρκβ) should occupy its own line, embedded in a num tag (but how?--as upper margin?). L. 27: record trema marks in Ιαλ̣μ̣ L. 28: give reading of papyrus, Μινύρου, and record the editors †Μινύρου† in the app. with an ed tag? Add paragraphos beetween lines 29 and 30. Ln. 31: record trema mark in Εἰκ̣αρ̣ι̣ο̣υ and capitalize the word to right of reg. Add num tag in this line and in 33 (bis) and 34. L. 32: --> <:ἐκ|reg|ἐγ:>. L. 33: κ̣̅[δ̅·] is not what is printed in the ed. pr. L. 34 has not been entered correctly. L. 41: record apostrophe between πρὸς and γάμον; register deletion 〚Αι〛. L. 42: <:Δ̣α̣ναί̈δας|reg|δαναί̈δες:> does not reflect what is in the ed. pr. (corr tag needed instead); trema marks wrongly encoded. L. 46: --> βρα̣χ̣ὺ̣[ν] [.?] In lines 50 and 51 add ] [.?] at line end. 53: record trema marks correctly; --> Θράκης. L. 55: ed. pr. spells Ἐργεῖνος. L. 59: reg is incorrectly recorded. L. 60: --> Πεί
